timeline.bodyText: This method is never overridden, do you plan that in the future?
timeline.author: viliam-durina

replies.bodyText: Yes, it will be overridden in the index scan operator.
replies.author: devozerov

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't we set use projects=[] for the scan? It should be able to handle zero fields...
timeline.author: viliam-durina

replies.bodyText:
It was not supported in the first version with the explicit comment in the ProjectIntoScan rule.
I added the support for this case in the last commit.
replies.author: devozerov

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't we allow empty projects as distinct from null. I guess null means "all the table fields", empty projects would mean no columns are actually selected. For the query SELECT current_date() FORM map
timeline.author: viliam-durina

timeline.message: Added support for empty project list for scan when parent operator do not use any columns (e.g. SELECT GET_DATE FROM person).

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we can annotate this method as @Nonnull
timeline.author: viliam-durina
viliam-durina

timeline.bodyText:
Doesn't matter much, but we should throw IndexOutOfBoundsException("index=" + index). The operation doesn't have a missing implementation - it's implemented, but there's no valid index it can be called with.
Same in EmptyRowBatch.getRow()
